tag_list: joshua-feinberg, computer-consulting-kit, computer-consultants, vars, computer-resellers, network-integrators, systems-integrators, computer-repair-businesses, it-solution-providers, managed-services-providers, small-business-it, smb, channel-strategy, bu
overview:
Joshua Feinberg is a noted expert, featured panelist and author on business development for the small business computer consulting industry. He is often quoted by the media on questions concerning this field.

The computer consulting industry consists of a wide variety of information technology consultants who provide consulting, support, implementation, training and various business analysis services relating to technical issues.

Feinberg is the author and editorial director of the Computer Consulting Kit Home Study Course, which helps computer consultants navigate the business side of their field.

Feinberg is also the author of Building Profitable Solutions with Microsoft Backoffice Small Business Solutions Server 4.5 (Microsoft Press).

Joshua Feinberg’s tools, resources, and strategies are now in use by thousands of consultants, integrators, VARs, and SP’s, all over the USA, Canada, UK, Australia, New Zealand, South Africa, Ireland, and 31 other nations around the Globe.

Publications writing about or quoting Joshua Feinberg include USA Today, eWeek, The Washington Times, NetworkWorld, CRN, VARBusiness, Inc.com Technology, Small Business Computing, U.S. SBA SCORE publications, TechRepublic, American Express Business Platinum Ventures, and the AICPA Journal of Accountancy.

In addition, Joshua Feinberg has been a featured panelist at a Ziff Davis SMB eSeminar on Small Business Disaster Preparedness.
